header.title: Jeden Tag die Bibel erleben
header.strapline: Bibel in einem Jahr hilft dir dabei, Schritt für Schritt.

img.desc: Eine Frau schaut vom Smartphone auf, auf dem sie Bibel in Einem Jahr liest.

header.title: Start your day with the Bible in One Year
header.strapline: How different could your life be if you started each morning reading the Bible?

img.desc: A man looks down at his phone, while listening to Bible in One Year

en.intro: Form a daily habit of reading Scripture

about.outro: Nicky & Pippa lead Holy Trinity Brompton (HTB), a church in central London. They first introduced the Bible in One Year commentary in 2011 as a daily email for their congregation members. Since then it has grown beyond that daily email to be a website, app, podcast, and more with a worldwide following.
about.quote: Join us as we read the Bible each day. It’s a practice that we have been doing for over 30 years and we hope it will benefit your life as much as it has ours.
about.intro: Bible in One Year is a practice that Nicky & Pippa Gumbel have been doing for over thirty years. Join them each day as they take you into every chapter and every verse in the Bible and let the Holy Spirit speak into your life.
about.header: Let Nicky and Pippa Be Your Guide

header.title: Want to get to know theBible?
header.strapline: We'll take you through it, step by step.

img.desc: A woman looks up from reading Bible In One Year on her phone.

editions.intro: Bible in One Year comes in three editions, and is being translated into many languages ...
